merit_scholarships.name: Wells Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.amount: Full cost of attendance (~$30K/yr in-state, ~$60K/yr OOS) + up to $25,000 study abroad funding
merit_scholarships.description: IU's most prestigious merit scholarship. ~18 students/year selected for full tuition, fees, housing stipend, and summer experience funding. Automatic Hutton Honors College admission.

merit_scholarships.name: Kelley Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.description: Kelley School of Business top merit award. Small cohort, requires Business Honors Program participation.

merit_scholarships.name: Hudson & Holland Scholars Program
merit_scholarships.description: IU's largest merit scholarship program focused on students from underrepresented communities including limited-income, first-generation, and rural students.

honors_program.name: Hutton Honors College
honors_program.description: Separate application required. Honors-only courses, priority enrollment, research funding, residential community.
